meaningMnemonic: This <radical>car</radical> is all weird because it looks like the side is going to <kanji>dangle</kanji> and <kanji>drip</kanji> off or something. The front bumper of the car is dangling off and the sides of the car look like they could drip off at any moment.
readingMnemonic: You see the parts as they <kanji>dangle</kanji> off the car and you get an idea. You could probably <reading>swi</reading>ng (すい) on these dangling parts. The parts can probably take some weight still before they <kanji>drip</kanji> off the car, so you might as well swing around on them while you still can.
